examples: She's a talented actor who has appeared in many movies and TV shows.
The play had a great cast of actors.
Ela é uma atriz talentosa que já apareceu em muitos filmes e programas de TV.
A peça tinha um ótimo elenco de atores.

suggested: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the action-packed ketchup!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised. Now that's what I call action.
I used to be the life of the party, but now I just watch the action from the sidelines.
I miss the days when my life was full of action and adventure.
Why do action movies always have to be so loud? I can't even hear myself think!
I hate it when people talk about taking action but never actually do anything about it.
Did you know that taking action can actually reduce stress and anxiety?
There's a form of meditation called 'Action Meditation' where you focus on the present moment while performing a physical activity.
The smell of gunpowder and explosions in an action movie.
The scent of sweat and adrenaline during a high-intensity action sequence.
The sensation of your heart pounding in your chest during an intense action scene.
The feeling of the wind rushing past you as you take action.
Taking action for a cause you believe in can help you connect with like-minded individuals and create positive change.
Acting on your values and principles can help you feel a sense of purpose and connection to something greater than yourself.
